name: 50mm (1 1/2") PVC Ball Valve
description: Durable 50mm (1 1/2") PVC Ball Valve for various plumbing and irrigation applications.

details.overview: Built with high-quality PVC material, this Milan Flow ball valve ensures leak-proof performance and long-lasting durability.
features: Compact 50mm size suitable for plumbing and irrigation use
Durable PVC body ensures long-lasting, corrosion-free performance
Quarter-turn design for quick and easy shut-off
Compatible with both threaded and plain socket connections
Ergonomic lever handle for smooth operation

name: 40mm (1 1/2") CPVC Ball Valve
description: Durable 40mm (1 1/2") CPVC Ball Valve for various plumbing and irrigation applications.

details.overview: Built with high-quality CPVC material, this Milan Flow ball valve ensures leak-proof performance and long-lasting durability.
features: High-quality CPVC plastic ensures long-term performance
Compact 40mm size suitable for plumbing and irrigation use
Ball valve with Quarter-turn operation
Flanged or threaded end connections depending on the model
White with red handle
benefits: Leak-Free seal ensures no water loss
Smooth operation for easy flow control
Corrosion resistant ideal for hot and cold water systems
Versatile use suitable for residential, commercial and industrial plumbing
Easy installation compatible with CPVC pipe fittings
